question:
Consider the following statements about the Calling Attention Motion:
  1. It is mentioned in the rules of procedure
  2. It involves element of censure against the government
  3. Prior permission of the Speaker/Chairperson is required to move the motion
  Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Calling attention is a type of motion introduced by a member to call the attention of a minister to a matter of urgent public importance. The minister is expected to make authoritative statement from him on that matter. It can be introduced in any house of the parliament. It is mentioned in the rules of procedure.
